text:
League 1
Ligue 1: the nominated for the player trophy of the month of October are ...
As every month, the UNFP unveiled the names of the 3 players in the race for the title of the player of the month of Ligue 1. Ben Yedder, Di Maria and Thiago Silva are named.
04 Nov 2019, 19:30 by Charlie Creteur



During this month of October, the current top scorer of the French championship Wissam Ben Yedder has shone with AS Monaco. The latter scored 4 goals during this period. But Paris Saint-Germain side, Angel Di Maria has also been performing delivering two assists and scoring twice. Just like his team-mate Thiago Silva, solid defensively since the beginning of the season. Who will be elected player of the month of October? Answer next week!







Players of the month since the beginning of the season 2019-2020




Wissam Ben Yedder is also named + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

August: Eduardo Camavinga (Rennes)
September: Victor Osimhen (Lille)
